languages.text: "Огонь!" {n}Мастер вокса вторит приказу по вокс-системе артиллерийского отсека и через несколько минут вновь докладывает:{/n} "Неизвестные прекратили сближение, но продолжают следовать за нами на расстоянии. Головное судно вновь запрашивает разрешение на вокс-передачу".

traits.locale_text: "Огонь!" {n}Мастер Вокса вторит приказу по вокс-системе артиллерийского отсека и через несколько минут вновь докладывает:{/n} "Неизвестные прекратили сближение, но продолжают следовать за нами на расстоянии. Головное судно вновь запрашивает разрешение на вокс-передачу".

languages.text: "Fire!" {n}The Vox Master relays the order over the vox-system to the artillery compartment, and several minutes later reports:{/n} "The unidentified vessels have halted their approach, but they are continuing to trail us at a distance. The lead ship is again requesting permission for a vox-transmission."
languages.original_text: "Огонь!" {n}Мастер вокса вторит приказу по вокс-системе артиллерийского отсека и через несколько минут вновь докладывает:{/n} "Неизвестные прекратили сближение, но продолжают следовать за нами на расстоянии. Головное судно вновь запрашивает разрешение на вокс-передачу".

The lead ship is again requesting permission for a vox-transmission."

"Fire!" {n}The Vox Master relays the order over the vox-system to the artillery compartment, and several minutes later reports:{/n} "The unidentified vessels have halted their approach, but they are continuing to trail us at a distance. The lead ship is again requesting permission for a vox-transmission."

"Fire!" {n}The Vox Master relays the order over the vox-system to the artillery compartment, and several minutes later reports:{/n} "The unidentified vessels have halted their approach, but they are continuing to trail us at a distance. The lead ship is again requesting permission for a vox-transmission."

"Fire!" {n}The Vox Master relays the order over the vox-system to the artillery compartment, and several minutes later reports:{/n} "The unidentified vessels have halted their approach, but they are continuing to trail us at a distance. The lead ship is again requesting permission for a vox-transmission."

languages.text: “开火！”{n}音阵大师将你的命令传达给了炮兵舱。几分钟后，她向你报告道。{/n}“身份不明的飞船已经停止靠近，但依然在一定距离外跟踪我们。领头的飞船再次请求进行音阵通信。”
languages.original_text: "Fire!" {n}The Vox Master relays the order over the vox-system to the artillery compartment, and several minutes later reports:{/n} "The unidentified vessels have halted their approach, but they are continuing to trail us at a distance. The lead ship is again requesting permission for a vox-transmission."

traits.locale_text: “开火！”{n}音阵大师将你的命令传达给了炮兵舱。几分钟后，她向你报告道。{/n}“身份不明的飞船已经停止靠近，但依然在一定距离外跟踪我们。领头的飞船再次请求进行音阵通信。”

languages.text: «¡Fuego!». {n}La maestra de vocos da la orden al compartimento de artillería. A los pocos minutos, informa:{/n} «Las naves no identificadas han detenido su aproximación, pero nos siguen a más distancia. La nave delantera vuelve a solicitar permiso para una transmisión de voco».
languages.original_text: "Fire!" {n}The Vox Master relays the order over the vox-system to the artillery compartment, and several minutes later reports:{/n} "The unidentified vessels have halted their approach, but they are continuing to trail us at a distance. The lead ship is again requesting permission for a vox-transmission."

traits.locale_text: «¡Fuego!». {n}La maestra de vocos da la orden al compartimento de artillería. A los pocos minutos, informa:{/n} «Las naves no identificadas han detenido su aproximación, pero nos siguen a más distancia. La nave delantera vuelve a solicitar permiso para una transmisión de voco».

languages.text: 「撃て！」{n}ヴォクス・マスターはヴォクス・システムで砲撃区に命令を中継すると、数分後に報告が上がる。{/n}「正体不明の艦隊は接近をやめましたが、距離を置いてこちらの追跡を続けています。艦隊を先導する船は、再度ヴォクス通信の許可を求めています」
languages.original_text: "Fire!" {n}The Vox Master relays the order over the vox-system to the artillery compartment, and several minutes later reports:{/n} "The unidentified vessels have halted their approach, but they are continuing to trail us at a distance. The lead ship is again requesting permission for a vox-transmission."

traits.locale_text: 「撃て！」{n}ヴォクス・マスターはヴォクス・システムで砲撃区に命令を中継すると、数分後に報告が上がる。{/n}「正体不明の艦隊は接近をやめましたが、距離を置いてこちらの追跡を続けています。艦隊を先導する船は、再度ヴォクス通信の許可を求めています」

languages.text: « Feu ! » {n}La maîtresse-vox transmet votre ordre au compartiment de l'artillerie, puis revient vers vous au bout de quelques minutes :{/n} « Les appareils non identifiés ont interrompu leur approche, mais continuent de nous suivre à distance. Le vaisseau principal demande à nouveau l'autorisation de nous contacter par émetteur-vox. »
languages.original_text: "Fire!" {n}The Vox Master relays the order over the vox-system to the artillery compartment, and several minutes later reports:{/n} "The unidentified vessels have halted their approach, but they are continuing to trail us at a distance. The lead ship is again requesting permission for a vox-transmission."

traits.locale_text: « Feu ! » {n}La maîtresse-vox transmet votre ordre au compartiment de l'artillerie, puis revient vers vous au bout de quelques minutes :{/n} « Les appareils non identifiés ont interrompu leur approche, mais continuent de nous suivre à distance. Le vaisseau principal demande à nouveau l'autorisation de nous contacter par émetteur-vox. »

languages.text: "Feuer!" {n}Die Voxmeisterin gibt den Befehl über das Voxsystem an die Artillerie weiter und meldet einige Minuten später:{/n} "Die nicht identifizierten Schiffe halten Distanz, folgen uns aber weiterhin in größerer Distanz. Das Hauptschiff bittet erneut um eine Vox-Übertragung."
languages.original_text: "Fire!" {n}The Vox Master relays the order over the vox-system to the artillery compartment, and several minutes later reports:{/n} "The unidentified vessels have halted their approach, but they are continuing to trail us at a distance. The lead ship is again requesting permission for a vox-transmission."

traits.locale_text: "Feuer!" {n}Die Voxmeisterin gibt den Befehl über das Voxsystem an die Artillerie weiter und meldet einige Minuten später:{/n} "Die nicht identifizierten Schiffe halten Distanz, folgen uns aber weiterhin in größerer Distanz. Das Hauptschiff bittet erneut um eine Vox-Übertragung."

languages.text: "Ateş!" {n}Verdiğin emri topçu kompartımanına ileten Voks Üstadı, birkaç dakika sonra bilgi veriyor.{/n} "Tanımlanamayan gemiler, yaklaşmayı kesse de belli bir mesafeden takibi sürdürüyor. Başı çeken gemi, voks iletişimi için tekrar talep gönderdi."
languages.original_text: "Fire!" {n}The Vox Master relays the order over the vox-system to the artillery compartment, and several minutes later reports:{/n} "The unidentified vessels have halted their approach, but they are continuing to trail us at a distance. The lead ship is again requesting permission for a vox-transmission."
